text: The representatives of the Association of Families Searching Disappeared Relatives met with the President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidential Secretariat, on (06).The officials, including Secretary to the President Austin Fernando and Secretary to the Ministry of National Integration andReconciliation participated on this meeting.The representatives of the Association of Families Searching Disappeared Relatives met with the President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidential Secretariat, on (06).The officials, including Secretary to the President Austin Fernando and Secretary to the Ministry of National Integration andReconciliation participated on this meeting.
title: Family members of disappeared persons calls on President
